objects.description: [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) has renamed a NetCat binary to kb-10233.exe to masquerade as a Windows update. [APT32](https://attack.mitre.org/groups/G0050) has also renamed a Cobalt Strike beacon payload to install_flashplayers.exe. (Citation: Cybereason Cobalt Kitty 2017)(Citation: Volexity Ocean Lotus November 2020)

external_references.description: Dahan, A. (2017). Operation Cobalt Kitty. Retrieved December 27, 2018.
Adair, S. and Lancaster, T. (2020, November 6). OceanLotus: Extending Cyber Espionage Operations Through Fake Websites. Retrieved November 20, 2020.
